WorkItem.Description:
current HtmlAttribute doesn't recognize values containing spaces.
 
I've recently come across the following values that fail to get recognized properly.
 
attribute="some text"
attribute=some text
 
both of the above example do not get recognized as HtmlAttributes

Comments.Message:
I strongly disagree. The current behavior IS CORRECT; spaces ARE considered as attribute separators unless wrapped into double quotes.

For example the HTML <input type=radio name=MyRadButton value=MyValue checked>
should equals: <input type="radio" name="MyRadButton" value="MyValue" checked>
and not: <input type="radio" name="MyRadButton" value="MyValue checked"> as "rcaudin" proposed
